title: Dion Waiters’s Suspension, Hayward’s Hand, and the Nightmare in New York | Heat Check
description:
Instant Replay: Dion Waiters’s suspension, Gordon Hayward’s injury, and the success of the Raptors (03:00).

The Main Event: James Dolan and the dreadful Knicks (22:00).

Good Call/Bad Call: Giannis gets violent, Nick Nurse gets touchy, Carmelo still wants to ball, and the Clippers’ throwback jerseys (36:15).

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Haley O’Shaughnessy and Dan Devine 

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
